Call Horror:Unknown Effect 126 (-7)?
The caster sacrifices human blood to attract a Horror. The being will feed on the fear and suffering of dying soldiers and will continue to attack everyone on the battlefield until all are dead. The horror will appear at the edge of the battlefield.
